text: Stadio Primo Nebiolo is a baseball stadium located in Messina, Italy. It was built in 1998, and was named after the former president of the IAAF, Primo Nebiolo. Hosted rounds of the 1998 Baseball World Cup and 2009. ==Gallery== File:Primo Nebiolo Stadium eastern.JPG|The outside of the stadium File:Primo Nebiolo Stadium 6.JPG|Total view of the field and tribune File:Primo Nebiolo Stadium tribune 1.JPG|The stands File:Primo Nebiolo Stadium scoreboard.JPG|The electronic scoreboard ==See also== *1998 Baseball World Cup *2009 Baseball World Cup ==External links== * Impianti Contrada Conca d'Oro * Lo stadio del baseball dell'Università di Messina * Italian Baseball and Softball Federation * Primo Nebiolo Primo Nebiolo Category:Metropolitan City of Messina
title: Stadio Primo Nebiolo
